Name: Toilevator Toilet Riser
Specifications:
Clean & safe alternative to standard raised toilet seats
  • Adds 3.5 inches (9 cm) in height for comfort & ease
  • Dimensions (Standard): 22(1/3)" x 11(1/4)" x 3(1/2)"
  • Dimensions (Grande): 28" x 14(1/4)" x 3(1/2)"
  • 500 lbs (230 kg) maximum weight capacity
  • Suitable for people with mobility issues
  • User's sit on an actual toilet seat
  • Discreet & durable; fits under existing toilet base
  • No special cleaning or maintenance required
  • Fits standard round or elongated toilet bases
  • Complete do-it-yourself kit includes:
    • Spacer base
    • Soil pipe extension
    • Long closet bolts
    • Hexagon nuts
    • Washers
